summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, accepting the condemnation award in the matter of Petition of The City of Seattle to acquire by condemnation certain property and property rights in the southwest one-quarter of the southwest one-quarter of Section 26, Township 25 North, Range 5 East, W.M., for the Tess Water Pump Station, King County Superior Court Cause No. 82-2-14779-6, Ordinance 110633; and authorizing payment. (TESS Pump Station - N.E. 8th Street).
